attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for child killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment should bring back the death penalty for anybody who kills a child as at the moment the law is letting children down and how can any normal person murder a child? why should people who do murder them be allowed to carry on with there life's when they have taken a child's
The goverment needs to act now and change the law and bring back the death penalty for child killers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
